overview: Join Reel Art Academy with Sean Dye painting "Country Landscapes." In this DVD, Sean will take you through various mixed media including charcoal, ink, gouache, and pastels to create a vibrant abstract landscape. This lesson is packed with tips and techniques; everything from how to get started scaling a reference photo to fixing mistakes throughout the process, and finally the finishing touches. Grab your Starter Set and have some fun in the studio with Sean Dye!
title: Country Landscapes
